title: Website

title: Nosville
short_description: A fully functional help request tool where users could ask and receive help to their requests

title: CityWe
short_description: A digital multiplayer card game where players create their own city district by means of playing cards

title: Truebiters
short_description: A digital educational game intended for teaching basics of learning about booleans. The game also had a multiplayer game over bluetooth. The game was functional and made available on Android and IOS stores

title: Minerva
short_description: An adaptive educational game that changed depending on players learning and play styles

title: Zombie Slayer
short_description: A simple enemy wave game where player must survive as long as possible. The pixel art was created by myself

title: Leometry AR
short_description: A simple educational game built for Android platform that also utilized AR for launching certain ingame events
